dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Yeah, hey there, nice to meet you... Got a screw to spare?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Let's see~ Two jobs for this morning, three in the afternoon... Yup, guess I can afford one coffee break.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Seen my boss around here? She lost a bet with pepper chili lettuce curry pie on the line a bit ago, and she hasn't returned yet.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: The Nest's nightscape is always fascinating. Shame none of those lights are mine.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: Hey, that ticking of your clock's making me nervous, can you let me smoke in peace at least...

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Payments on time are all I ask for. If you're strapped for cash, I won't mind some useful scraps.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Wait a minute, what's wrong with... Huh? Oh... I'm fine. This thing just conks out sometimes... Hm? Why are you standing so far away?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: Well, yeah, I change this arm whenever needed. I used to have one for lighting fires, but I got careless and burned my beard with it.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Say, you and I get along pretty well, don't you think? If you've got business for me after this request is done, tell my boss and I'll be there.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Don't leave me alone, bud. I can get lonely pretty easily.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Oh, erm... I wasn't planning to stay here for long... You gonna take the responsibility?

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Don't care where it is. Just lead the way.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Right. Did I change the batteries for my arm?

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: What, something needs maintenance?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Is it time to rev up?

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Doable.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ow... Easy, buddy.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Sharpening the sawblade yesterday paid off.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Should've... given my arm... a self-destruct upgrade...

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Well, I'm not one to get smug over this kind of stuff. Hmmm... Hmhmm~

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Oh boy, why's my arm so stiff today... Ahem... Kehm, hmm...

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Better do my part.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: What's that? You gonna pay me a bonus? I'm not about to turn it down.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Ah, shoot... My arm keeps refusing to work with the grease... It was a little squeaky.
